name: Commercial Space ITP
Plumbing Rough In
All water & gas risers are complete
All stacks are level/plumb
Ensure all services that go through fire rated walls to be treated with collars/fire rated sealant
Electrical Rough In
Power points have been installed as per the electrical plans
All comms are installed to allow for good detailing around
GPO's are correct for air conditioning & functional
Mechanical Rough In
All aircon has been roughed in & tested
All mech has been roughed in & completed
All services that go through fire rated walls to be treated with collars/fire rated sealant
Duct work to be tear free & sealed prior to cleaning
Pre Wall Linings
Ensure all penetrations have been installed as per specifications
Ensure all fire collars have been installed in accordance with manufacturer's specifications & clause C315 of the BCA
Ensure that mechanical ductwork is suitably sealed when passing through firewalls
Ensure that suitable access is provided to mechanical fire dampers in accordance with clause C315 of the BCA
Ensure electrical cables have been suitably sealed when passing through a fire element in accordance with clause C315 of the BCA
Ensure that NBN collars have been installed with grafitex on both sides of the hebel walls in accordance with clause C315 of the BCA
Check that fire doors have been filled
Post Wall Linings
Ensure MSDS & installation guide has been followed for insulation
Ensure MSDS & installation guide has been followed for fire rated walls
Tiling
All floors fall to wastes & don't hold water
Ensure all tiles are fixed correctly
Services Fit Out
Plumbing fitout have been tested & commissioned
Electrical fitout have been tested & commissioned
Air Conditioning / Mech fitout have been tested & commissioned
Internal Painting
Painting completed as per specs, correct Dulux product used
Framing
All studs are set out correct, and are plumb level, square & installed as per manufacturer's recommendations
Hebel has been fire caulked to the ceiling and floor
Carpet
Carpet installed as per specifications
Fire System
Smoke detectors & sensors fit off completed
Smoke detectors & sensors tested as per manufacturer's instructions
Sprinkler rough fit off completed
Sprinklers commissioned
EWIS speakers installed as per manufacturer's instructions
All fire signage installed correctly and visible - If applicable
Aland Final Sign - Off
All apartment work is completed as per specifications / drawings. All relevant trade QA reviewed & approved
Aland - apartment final sign off
